title: Reading: Lila - An Inquiry into Morals - by Robert M. Pirsig - Chapter 4
description:
After Dusenberry's death, Phaedrus tries his hand at anthropology, only to discover the Cultural Immune System. Plus, Pheadrus is intrigued by the tale of another singular genius who appears to be on the same track in terms of his big revelation during the peyote ceremony in chapter 3. 

Twitter: @AQualityX
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/A_Quality_Existence
Website: AQualityExistence.com
Email: AQualityExistence@gmail.com
